title: FS:  T206 - PSA and SGC graded – ALL SOLD

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 - PSA and SGC graded – ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have the following graded T206s for sale:

Charlie Starr, PSA 3, Piedmont 350, no creases - $35 SOLD
Vive Lindaman, PSA 3, Sweet Caporal 150/30, no creases, nice color - $40 SOLD
Moose Grimshaw, PSA 5, Cycle 350, clean, super nice back - $240 SOLD
John McGraw (Glove On Hip), PSA 4, Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42, wet sheet transfer on front - $165 SOLD
Art Devlin, SGC 40/3, Sweet Caporal 350/30, no creases, just corner dings - $40 SOLD
Harry Arndt, SGC 50/4, Sweet Caporal 350/25, no creases, nice color - $45 SOLD
Chief Bender (Portrait), SGC 20/1.5, Piedmont 350, stain, creases but not on face - $50 SOLD

Prices include shipping.  Add $2.00 for insurance (at your option).  Cards will be shipped on Monday.

E-mails preferred, but PMs welcome.  E-mail is sschris at att dot net.  

Standard Paypal is my preferred method of payment.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE.  I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME.  I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS.

Thanks for looking.

Steve

Hi Steve

I'll take the Arndt if it is still available.

If it is, PM me your Paypal address and I'll get the money sent.

Thanks

Jantz
